channel.title: XKey Updates
channel.description: XKey - Vietnamese Input Method for macOS

item.title: Version 1.2.20 (Build 20260220)
item.description:
What's New

fix: XKeyIM only logs to file when debugModeEnabled is true

  • Change DebugLogger.isLoggingEnabled default from true to false
  • XKeyIMSettings reads debugModeEnabled from App Group plist
  • XKeyIMController syncs isLoggingEnabled before preWarmSingletons()
  • Auto-disable logging when debugWindowController is disconnected
  • Respond to realtime debug mode toggle via DistributedNotification
  • Bump build number to 20260220

Xem chi tiết trên GitHub
